wikipedia_page.main: Douglas Joseph Pirie (11 May 1907 – 19 June 1935) was an English motorcycle racer who won the Manx Grand Prix. He died, aged 28, in an accident during the 1935 Isle of Man TT races. He is buried at Southgate Cemetery, London.

response: * Douglas J. Pirie (c. 1907-1935) English motorcycle racer
